description: Leading tour services provider, VIP Ontario Tours, showing the world the best of Canada with its wide range of VIP tour packages, specifically tours to Niagara Falls. VIP Ontario Tours is looking to continue in its aim of making Canada a major tourist and holiday destination as the tour service provider offers a plethora of tours including private and small group tours from Toronto. Consequently, VIP Ontario Tours has become one of the most sought-after tourist services providers for persons that want to discover Toronto and other parts of Canada in style and luxury.

reviews.title: Bea and Roger were great hosts
text: The tour was a very informative way to start sightseeing Toronto. Beatrice and Roger were great hosts driving the group around and sharing details of the history of the city and the present happenings of construction of new light rail lines. Bea explained the importance of The Asian Canadiens contributions to the city during the emergence of Toronto.  Bea gave us restaurant recommendations to visit for authentic local cuisines. Overall, the tour was an amazing way to see Toronto from locals.

reviews.title: Fantastic full day out
text: This was a fantastic full day excursion to Niagra Falls. Our knowledgeable tour guide was able to provide an interesting commentary as we drove down on the coach, and she and our driver were very friendly and helpful.
The boat trip was amazing even if we got quite wet! We enjoyed a terrific lunch at the Sheraton Hotel with panoramic views over the falls and surrounding area.
Our trip included a visit to the picturesque town of Niagra,  and a wine tasting experience at a local vineyard.
This was a really great day out, extremely well organised, and excellent value for money.

reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
text: I only have one suggestion regarding the tour. When a small group like we were (4 tourists) perhaps a vehicle that has bigger windows and the interior isn't quite so dark. Other than that, the tour was absolutely wonderful! Our tour guide Beatrice (B) was so knowledgeable, courteous and friendly. And our driver Mike was absolutely great.
Definitely would recommend this tour and these two lovely individuals again and again! Check it for yourselves!

reviews.title: Niagara a must.
text: First time using Viator for anything and they did not disappoint us. 9hr day trip to Niagara stopping on way for maple syrup tasting then onto the Falls. Breathtaking.  Our driver/ guide Sholz was superb giving details of the trip. His driving was excellent and we never felt worried although traffic was heavy at times.

reviews.title: Best solo full day tour Niagra Falls
text: Peter was the best tour guide! I had the absolute best time by myself but met amazing friends from around the world. Comfy new bus & great driver. Boat ride at the falls then buffet lunch with amazing views then a stop in the cutest town called Niagra on the lake! Then delicious wine tasting at hare wines! Highly recommended by my travel agency!

reviews.title: Day of fun!!!
text: Total recommend, had a lot of fun , operator explained the sites and history as you ride , made sure everyone was in attendance after each stop so no one was left behind , the wine tasting was great ending of the tour ..

reviews.title: Excellent trip to Niagara Falls and Beyone.
text: Wonderful tour guide (Alex) and great driver (Hugo). Very entertaining and informative. Well organized, right amount of free time, several activites and experiences including the fabulous Niagara Falls boat trip, the whirlpool, a stroll through Niagara-on-the-lake with time to shop, and a trip to a vineyard and tasting. Great day. Well worth the money!

reviews.title: A great way to experience Niagara Falls
text: Very nice tour. The guide, Crystal, and the driver, Sam, did a fantastic job getting us there and leading our journey. Niagara Falls was amazing. Definitely take the boat ride!  It’s incredible to get so close to the falls!!!  Beware, you’ll get wet!  The included lunch was very nice. The small town of Niagara on the lake is charming.  Our final stop at the winery was much better than expected. We even purchased a few bottles of wine. Would highly recommend this tour from Toronto as an easy/great way to get to and from and to experience Niagara Falls.

reviews.title: Very good trip with very acknowledge people☺️
text: It was totally worth it! I do not remember his name, but our guide was from Sr Lanka and he was so friendly and professional. He gave us a lot of information about all the places we went. I would highly recommend to do the tour, it worth every cent and you will have a great experience with them ☺️

reviews.title: Niagra Falls
text: Finally decided to go to Niagra falls. Reached by 11.45 am from where busses took us to table rock area whee the fall was outstanding & there I made up my mind to stay a night, therefore went to Sheraton as it was the best as near to all attractions.  After checking inn went outside for the boat ride which takes us near the fall. The experience was outstanding. After the boat ride came to hotel, got the room & went to sleep but in evening I changed the room as there was elevator sound like plane engine. Got a better & bigger room. Walked in night too as the area is big so had to cover. Slept at 12 am midnight.

reviews.title: Great experience
text: Roy was our guide and we had a wonderful time. He was very kind and showed us around. Great experience! We were able to take our time to see everything.

reviews.title: Excellent - best of the options to see Niagara
text: Fantastic experience, excellent tour guide. Nice mixture of 3 main sites. Would highly recommend.
Peter was brilliant, knows his stuff and really knowledgable.
Niagara falls was cool, something ticked off the bucket list but wouldn’t recommend spending long there after you’ve seen the falls.
Niagara on the lake was awesome - could have done with a bit more time there.
Definitely squeeze in a winery visit if you go - although the one we went to wasn’t great.
This tour ticks all 3 off the list. My only feedback would be to pick a different winery to visit.

reviews.title: AWESOME TRIP, INCREDIBLE CREW! TAKE THE TIME TO READ THIS:
text: Begining with Crystal: she's just great! She always made herself available to meet every request and to answer every question we may have. From arranging our airport's pickup to fully customize the experience (up to the point of selecting champagne's brand) and ending picking up us at the hotel to get to the airport,  she made sure everything went perfect!
Cheers to the whole driving crew:
Sasi was so patient and kind waiting for us to clear customs and baggage at the airport, regardless of the delays.
Walter is a smart, super educated person who knows about economics, politics, local culture and movies, who also kindly meet every request we had. We really enjoyed his company and smart talking.

And at last but not least, Rickardo is an extremely funny, kind and happy guy who made us felt like we were at home all the time, even singing at the car! We wished we could have spent more time with him!
We wil definitely definitely DEFINITELY repeat on our next visit!

reviews.title: Bernard was awesome
text: The trip was decent. Bernard, our guide, made it very enjoyable. My only complaint is the size of the tourist van. After about the first 2 rows, seating became really tight and uncomfortable.

reviews.title: Beautiful Niagara Tour
text: It was a full packed tour and was great. Bus was very comfortable and our guid was very polite and knowledgeable about the area and we had enough time to explore the are by ourselves.

I was a little bit disappointed when I found out there wouldn’t be a boat ride, they haven’t mentioned in their website that the bout is only going on certain date. I’ve communicated with them and they’ve reimbursed us around 10%.
Still, I highly recommended this tour.

reviews.title: Rain did not hinder.
text: It all was great but the boat ride was the highlight. We had a 5 star tour guild named Lennie. He was full of information and funny. He took us to a small bakery and deli that was delicious.

reviews.title: Summer rose all day !!!
text: Kristen was an absolute beast. We were 6 and we all had different orders. She was quick, efficient and even remembered our drink orders making it an easy breezy experience. Full box of crackers with our cheese order making it a 10/10 experience for us. Sparkling rosé all day.

reviews.title: 1 Night trip to Lovely Prince Edward County.
text: This was my third time visiting PEC during the pandemic.  I absolutely am In love.  My first trip was a day trip and the next 2 trips were over night (one night).  I’ll preface that I’m a white wine drinker but not a wine expert.  I’m more into the experience than the wine.  Each one of the wineries we visited had a different feel and food offering.  Below is my itinerary for my latest trip.
Day 1  -
9:00 - Leave Toronto
11:00 Early lunch at Norman Hardie
1:30  Cider Loch Mor
2:00 Sandbanks Winery
3:30 Kinsip
5:00 Picton Harbour Hotel
7:15 Hartley Tavern Dinner
Day 2
10am - Lighthouse Restaurant for breakfast
11:30 Bird House Hike
1:00 Fifth house town Cheese
2:00 Waupous Estate Winery
3:00 Keint He Winery
3:30The old Third for pasta and wine
Head home

reviews.title: Niagra falls tour from Toronto
text: Booked at last minute after seeing trip advisor reviews. Brilliant tour with Peter the driver. Second visit to Niagra but first tour. Going with a tour had a bonus of local knowledge and relevant history/information which enhanced our visit. Strongly recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls tour
text: Our tour guide Saleem was fantastic from start to finish. His knowledge of the areas we travelled through was amazing, his humour was also great. I can't recommend this tour enough my only regret was that we didn't have long enough in either Niagara or Niagara on the lake. But overall a amazing experience that we will never forget 😊

reviews.title: Great day out!!!
text: Our tour guide (Vasyl) and driver were both very knowledgeable, kind and really enthusiastic about making sure our day was enjoyable. The boat trip was amazing- definitely prepare to get soaked! And niagara on the lake was just stunning, would have liked more time there! Excellent day overall :)

reviews.title: Tour to Niagara!
text: We had an awesome day trip to Niagara Falls, and Niagara on the Lake!  Peter was the very best tour guide we have ever had!  His knowledge of the area’s history was phenomenal!  His guidance was the best, and we felt comfortable with him the entire trip!  We also loved all the others guests in our van!  I would recommend using VIP Ontario Tours.  We will for any future trips we take!

reviews.title: Amazing weekend at Prince Edward County
text: I would like to highly reccommend  a hlaf day tour with PEC Wine Tours from Bloomfield. This was my first time in Prince Edward County and I loved it.  We had a great time visiting 3 wineries. The highlight was the Hardwood Estate Winery with wine and food pairing and also our driver and a tour guide Gilley.  He was very knowledgable about the area and the wines and made the afternoon enjoyable for everyone. Great job Gilley.   The only suggestion I have for PEC Wine Tours and the only reason why I am giving 4 stars is Casa Dea winery.  It should be taken off the tour since it was very impersonal, nobody talked to us about the wines and nobody was interested in our presence there.

reviews.title: Amazing day, communication could’ve been better regarding ticketing & arrival time in morning.
text: Saleem was a fantastic tour guide, overall an amazing day, but 4 stars as there was there was a mix up with booking boat tour

reviews.title: Terrific tour
text: Fantastic. Booked this at the last minute as my original tour was cancelled the night before. Gaurav was our guide, brilliant and very knowledgeable. Took time out to explain things to the group and also individually. He made sure I got my ticket for behind the Falls as the boat doesn’t go in March. Niagara-on-the-Lake was absolutely beautiful and we got time to go round all the attractions. Really enjoyed it and would recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Payed €200 but VIP did not show up
text: I booked a tour to the Niagara fall with pickup at 8:30 at Fairmont Royal Clark hotel. We  waited till 9:30 but no bus came to pick us up. I paid over €200 for the trip. I received an email with “ Thanks for joining us” . Then I made a phonecall to VIP Ontario tours. I told the lady my story. She denied and said they were waiting for me. The porter at the hotel helped me all the time. Then the phonecall was interrupted by VIP. I tried several times to call but the call was not answered .
My advice. Don’t book with VIP.

reviews.title: Excellent experience
text: Excellent services the Driver was very kind, good attention, nice, and explained to us all the way through to trip

reviews.title: OMG
text: This was one of the most fantastic experiences of my life. It was like being in a disaster movie. Don’t go to Niagra without going on the boat trip

reviews.title: Best day of our trip
text: We had a fantastic day to Niagra Falls. Roy our driver and guide really looked after us and told us so many interesting details about the area and the history from the comfort of a luxury SUV. (Ask for Roy if you are booking!) The great thing about a private tour is you set the pace. It was no problem to stop for a coffee etc. Aside from the falls, Roy showed us some interesting sights along the way, from the whirlpool to the hydro power stations, from Niagra Park area to the pretty little town Niagra on the Lake. Just a lovely day out!

reviews.title: Great tour with Peter to Niagara Falls
text: Peter our guide was AWESOME!
He had a thorough bit of knowledge and information that was perfect for the tour ro Niagara Falls, the whirlpool, the Niagara Clock, and Niagara on the Lake!
The trip was perfect! I would suggest this tour to anyone!!!!!

reviews.title: Highly recommend, fantastic day out.
text: Coach was comfortable and cool with just the right amount of chatter from Daniel our guide, so we could watch the views. Great driving by Peter too. Niagara was breathtaking, boat ride amazing, lunch at the Sheraton was good, with great views of Niagara. Lake Niagara was cute, definitely visit the Xmas shop. The wine tasting was good.

One suggestion - we waited 45 minutes for everyone to finish their boat rides so we could go for lunch, which is time we could have been exploring. I suggest an agreed time and meeting place near the Sheraton so we’re not all sitting around waiting.

reviews.title: Great Experience
text: Best tour we’ve taken! Both the driver and tour guide were extremely nice and accommodating. We would take this tour again’

reviews.title: Definitely a worthwhile tour
text: This tour to the Falls was amazing.  I was able to cross visiting Niagara Falls from my bucket list of U.S. destinations to visit.  Booking the tour was easy and efficient; payment (either book now pay later, or pay now) was easy.  Confirmation of the pick up  location was within easy walking from our hotel.  Tour confirmation as well as cancellation process (if needed) were clear.  There were also great attraction stops on the way as well as leaving the Falls.
The driver, Peter, was excellent - providing commentary on sites and history of sites along the way to the Falls.

The only negatives were the information regarding the exact pick up location, which could have been more precise as well as the identifying uniform of the driver (the driver wore an uniform which did not  have a Trip Advisor nor Viator logo).
I would definitely recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Wonderful day trip to Niagara Falls & Niagara on the Lake
text: We chose to book this particular tour as it includes a 1 hour visit to Niagara on the Lake, which had been recommended to us. And we are so glad we did - we had a fantastic day. Peter, our driver and guide, did an excellent job, gave us lots of interesting information and was very humorous.

We hit pretty bad traffic both ways, but Peter adjusted the timings so that we could still enjoy the full itinerary. We had booked the optional Hornblower boat trip which was a fantastic experience - taking us so close to the incredibly powerful falls. We then had 1.5 hours to explore the falls area and we loved the walk up to Table Rock with amazing views along the way.

After leaving the falls, Peter took us to a maple syrup tasting, a drive along Parkway showing us points of interest, a 1 hour stop at Niagara on the Lake (a lovely place to visit), and finally a wine tasting at a winery.
It was a wonderful day, packed with lots of amazing sights and experiences, and full of information and fun.

reviews.title: One day tour to Niagara Falls and Niagara-on-the-Lake from Toronto
text: Fantastic views, well organized tour. It would be great if not the fact that driver/guide didn't have a microphone! He was talking a lot explaining and telling stories which we in seats bit further from the driver haven't heard at all. So, going on this kind of trip sit as close to driver as possible..

reviews.title: Great experience for us and our teens!
text: We had a great time on this day trip from Toronto to Niagara Falls - us and our two teens! And if you have teens, you know that’s high praise. The driver/tour guide was knowledgeable and we learned about all kinds of things about both locations and in between. Michael was fabulous at his job! I’ve already recommended this day trip to my parents travel group who will be here later in the year.

reviews.title: One of the best experiences ever!!
text: Everything was amazing!! So much better than we ever imagined. Our tour guide Vasilli was spectacular with so much knowledge!!!

reviews.title: Spectacular Visit to Niagara Falls region
text: The trip was amazing and the pace perfect for a couple in their late sixties. The Falls spectacular and the boat trip not to be missed. The other highlights were wine tasting at Two Sisters and lunch in Niagara on the Lake. What a gem of a town. Would do this again in a heartbeat. Vineet was our guide and knowledgeable and respectful of our time and pace. Five stars!

reviews.title: So recommend this activity
text: Loved the service and the experience. It was easy as it was all done for us like we wanted.. We got the small group package, which was not cheap but worth it. They did mention there was a wine tasting that ended up being a maple syrup tasting, didn't mind it, liked it as well.

My only con would be that we get too little time at the village so we couldn't enjoy it much cause it was lunch time and we had kids that needed to eat something so didnt quite get to see the village, let alone the Lake, would have been nice.,and that would be sorted by getting back at 6.30 instead of 5.30 pm.
Other than that our driver was so nice and told us so many stories, it made the trip easy and lovely.

reviews.title: No spanish audio no wine tasting
text: TripAdvisor should communicate with it's touring companies, here at their website said they included spanish audio guide,
They didn't,
They said they would pick me up at my hotel,
They didn't,
They said it included a wine tasting that lead me to believe it'd be at a winery house,
It wasn't,
They charged me almost 100CAD for a wine tasting at a store,
I would not recommend this tour at all,
